titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Georg Henrik von Wright, [13. 6. 1950 ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Trinity College Library; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (von Wright, S. 62).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks for the shoes which arrived the day after I did. I enjoyed what talks we had & I liked to see Kreisel again. I hope you still saw him after I left. I hope your journey to Finland won't be too unpleasant & that you'll spend your time there profitably. Let me hear from you if you've nothing better to do. Give all my good wishes to your wife & to Bevan if you see him. I'm pretty well & pretty stupid.
